segments.text: Ugh, this kitchen is disgusting with all that water spilling out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink's overflowing, and dirty water is just pouring onto everything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's foot is soaked in that filthy puddle—gross.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's drying a plate, but who knows how clean it really is now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are rummaging in the cookie jar like little thieves.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool's wobbling, and crumbs are probably everywhere from the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's hand out, begging—it's all so messy and improper.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water streaming down the cabinet doors, making everything sticky and wet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks clean, but this interior is a swamp.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Stacks of dishes just sitting there, probably not even rinsed well.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her apron's going to be ruined by all this slop.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe no one's turning off that faucet—revolting negligence.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is just unhygienic and out of control.
segments.speaker: PAR
